siteInfo.description: Professional wedding photographers in Hyderabad, Bangalore & across Andhra Pradesh

hero.title: Capture Life in Every Frame
hero.subtitle: Wedding Photographers in Hyderabad, Bangalore & South India
hero.description: At 5 Frames Photography, we specialize in capturing beautiful wedding moments across South India. From traditional Telugu weddings in Hyderabad to modern ceremonies in Bangalore, from grand celebrations in Vijayawada to intimate destination weddings in Andhra Pradesh - we create timeless memories that tell your unique love story.
hero.tagline: Serving Hyderabad | Bangalore | Vijayawada | Visakhapatnam | Guntur | Tirupati & All of South India

team.name: Vamsi Krishna CH
team.bio: Passionate about framing emotion and energy, Vamsi leads the vision behind 5 Frames with an eye for detail and cinematic flair.

team.name: Madhuri Reddy
team.bio: Ensuring a smooth client journey from inquiry to delivery.

team.name: Arjun Patil
team.bio: Captures cinematic stories from new perspectives.

team.name: Aarushi Nair
team.bio: Perfects the tones, textures, and balance that make every frame shine.

testimonials.name: Ananya Mehra
testimonials.text: Every emotion from our wedding was beautifully captured. Looking at our album still gives us goosebumps.

testimonials.name: Karan Verma
testimonials.text: They handled our baby's photoshoot with such patience and creativity. Every photo is pure magic.

testimonials.name: Simran Gill
testimonials.text: Professional, stylish, and innovative. The team made me feel comfortable and confident throughout the fashion shoot.

testimonials.name: Rohan Patel
testimonials.text: They covered our annual event seamlessly. Great coordination and stunning shots for our marketing materials.

blogs.description: How to plan your perfect day with stunning photography that lasts a lifetime.

blogs.description: Why authentic photos last a lifetime and how we capture them naturally.

services.title: Wedding Photography
services.description: Expert wedding photographers across Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Andhra Pradesh. We capture traditional Telugu weddings, South Indian ceremonies, destination weddings, and candid moments. From engagement shoots to reception coverage, we're there for every celebration.

services.title: Baby & Maternity Shoots
services.description: Tiny smiles, soft giggles, and first-time memories — we make sure these beautiful beginnings are remembered forever.

services.title: Portrait & Fashion Photography
services.description: Clean lines, perfect light, and powerful emotion. Whether personal branding, modeling, or editorial work, our portraits speak confidence and style.

services.title: Events & Lifestyle
services.description: Corporate events, family gatherings, or creative lifestyle sessions — we cover moments that reflect your identity and energy.

about.lead: We are a creative collective of photographers, editors, and visual storytellers driven by a shared passion for capturing moments that matter. Founded on the belief that every emotion deserves a frame, 5 Frames Photography blends artistry, technology, and empathy to create meaningful visual stories.
about.description: Our team has worked across weddings, fashion campaigns, baby portraits, product shoots, and travel documentaries. With every click, we aim to create an experience — not just an image.
about.mission: To frame your story in its most honest, beautiful, and timeless form.

coverageAreas.note: We cover destination weddings across all of South India
